Hey as long as it tastes good I don't care what's in it.

Hell I've been wanting to cook GRASSHOPPERS for a while now.[/bq]
In Japan cats are seen more of a food than a pet.

In China you literally can get aborted fetuses as soup.

. . . For the love of god if anyone here ever visits China only get food that you know what is in it, cause there's some weird food over there.

topics.body:
"@SquiggyBomb":/dis/the-time-wasting-thread/post/55a81ea96368727431000641#post_55a81ea96368727431000641

It would be bad enough if I was an adult. I saw that when I was _five._

It's definitely not as bad as it used to be, but I still flinch when I see one. And I may have refused all liquids for a day when I found a dead fly frozen in the ice cube in my drink.

and the list goes on
